H0.text: Who composed the musical theme for the Pink Panther. John Williams

H1.text: Who composed the musical theme for the Pink Panther. Quincy Jones

H2.text: Who composed the musical theme for the Pink Panther. Burt Bacharach

H3.text: Who composed the musical theme for the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini

A4.text: The jazz-based Pink Panther Theme was composed by Henry Mancini.
